Text:
Fucking relax this is an obscure movie, only released on VCD in Hong Kong (and DVD in Europe)

And XviD is not DVD quality, if you really like it buy the DVD
Where are the English subs exactly?  Mine only had german ones...  can someone pls reseed the english ones?
I was very surprised when this was over. One of the best horror flicks I've ever seen with a good plot and super acting. The violence is intense, but well spaced out. Highly recommended!
